name.ar,bg,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,e: Audio Recorder Online - Capture Screen Audio
name.am: Record Voice - Record Computer Audio Online
name.bn: Record Audio - Audio Recorder From Computer
name.de: Audio Capture On Chrome - Free Audio Recorder
name.pt_BR: Chrome Audio Recorder - Capture Audio Online
name.zh_CN: 即时音频录制器 - 捕获屏幕音频
name.zh_TW: 即時音頻錄制器 - 捕獲螢幕音頻

short.ar,bg,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,e: Record audio from tabs and microphone, with support for pause, preview, and save to computer.
short.am,fi: A free record voice, simple audio recorder allows you to conduct voice record on your computer.
short.bn: A free tool to record audio on your computer, use it for free voice recorder.
short.de: A free Chrome audio capture tool, no download needed, just install and you can record audio.
short.nl: Record and save audio easily with our WAV web-based online speech and voice recorder. with support for pause, preview, and save to…
short.pt_BR: Chrome audio recorder enables seamless audio capture within the Chrome browser. with support for pause, preview, and save to…
short.zh_CN: 从标签页和麦克风录制音频，支持暂停、预览和保存到电脑。
short.zh_TW: 從標籤頁和麥克風錄制音頻，支持暫停、預覽和保存到電腦。

long.ar:
🎵Record audio from tabs and microphone, with support for pause, preview, and save to computer.🎵
🏆This extension can easily help users record audio from tabs and microphones, offering features such as pause during recording, preview of the recording results, and saving the output files to your computer, currently supporting Mp3, webm, and wav formats. Fast, simple, efficient - perfectly capturing every sound moment.

🔥 Features:
● Unlimited recording duration, effortlessly record online meetings, remote courses, live concerts, or everyday conversations with just one click.
● Supports separate recording of tab and microphone audio.
● Offers functions to pause, preview, and save audio files.
● Supports saving files in different audio formats, such as MP3, WAV, Webm, etc.
● Privacy first, recordings are directly exported to your computer, we do not store your data or recordings.

🎙️ How to use:
1. Click the Add to Chrome button to install the Record Audio extension.
2. Open the tab where you wish to capture audio.
3. Open the plugin, select the type of recording: tab audio, microphone audio
4. Click Start Tab Recording to begin.
5. You can cancel, pause, and save the audio file at any time during the recording.
6. Preview the audio, choose the audio format and save the file to your device.

❓ Q&A:
Q: Is this extension free?
A: Currently, our extension is free, and we have also launched a free AI-generated music service, offering you faster response times, unrestricted access, and priority customer support.

Q: What audio formats does this extension support?
A: This app supports various audio formats, including MP3, WAV, etc., allowing users to choose the saving format according to their needs.

Q: Can it record tab audio and microphone audio at the same time?
A: Yes, this app supports simultaneous recording of tab and microphone audio, giving users flexible recording options.

Q: Can I pause and preview the audio during the recording process?
A: Yes, users can pause the recording at any time, preview the recorded content, and save the file when needed.

Q: Is this app safe and reliable?
A: Yes, we provide a safe and efficient recording function, ensuring users can conveniently save tab and microphone audio, securing data safety and privacy.

A: Currently, our extension is free, and we have also launched a free AI-generated music service, offering you faster response times, unrestricted access, and priority customer support.

Q: What audio formats does this extension support?
A: This app supports various audio formats, including MP3, WAV, etc., allowing users to choose the saving format according to their needs.

Q: Can it record tab audio and microphone audio at the same time?
A: Yes, this app supports simultaneous recording of tab and microphone audio, giving users flexible recording options.

Q: Can I pause and preview the audio during the recording process?
A: Yes, users can pause the recording at any time, preview the recorded content, and save the file when needed.

Q: Is this app safe and reliable?
A: Yes, we provide a safe and efficient recording function, ensuring users can conveniently save tab and microphone audio, securing data safety and privacy.

long.sv:
🎵Record audio from tabs and microphone, with support for pause, preview, and save to computer.🎵
🏆This extension can easily help users record audio from tabs and microphones, offering features such as pause during recording, preview of the recording results, and saving the output files to your computer, currently supporting Mp3, webm, and wav formats. Fast, simple, efficient - perfectly capturing every sound moment.

🔥 Features:
● Unlimited recording duration, effortlessly record online meetings, remote courses, live concerts, or everyday conversations with just one click.
● Supports separate recording of tab and microphone audio.
● Offers functions to pause, preview, and save audio files.
● Supports saving files in different audio formats, such as MP3, WAV, Webm, etc.
● Privacy first, recordings are directly exported to your computer, we do not store your data or recordings.

🎙️ How to use:
1. Click the Add to Chrome button to install the Record Audio extension.
2. Open the tab where you wish to capture audio.
3. Open the plugin, select the type of recording: tab audio, microphone audio
4. Click Start Tab Recording to begin.
5. You can cancel, pause, and save the audio file at any time during the recording.
6. Preview the audio, choose the audio format and save the file to your device.

❓ Q&A:
Q: Is this extension free?
A: Currently, our extension is free, and we have also launched a free AI-generated music service, offering you faster response times, unrestricted access, and priority customer support.

Q: What audio formats does this extension support?
A: This app supports various audio formats, including MP3, WAV, etc., allowing users to choose the saving format according to their needs.

Q: Can it record tab audio and microphone audio at the same time?
A: Yes, this app supports simultaneous recording of tab and microphone audio, giving users flexible recording options.

Q: Can I pause and preview the audio during the recording process?
A: Yes, users can pause the recording at any time, preview the recorded content, and save the file when needed.

Q: Is this app safe and reliable?
A: Yes, we provide a safe and efficient recording function, ensuring users can conveniently save tab and microphone audio, securing data safety and privacy.

long.zh_CN:
从标签页和麦克风录制音频，支持暂停、预览和保存到电脑
这款扩展程序可以帮助用户轻松地录制来自标签页和麦克风的音频，支持录制中暂停、录制结果预览、并将输出文件保存到您的电脑上，目前支持Mp3、webm、wav格式。快速、简单、高效——完美捕捉每一刻的声音。

功能特点：
● 录制时长不限，无论是在线会议、远程课程、音乐会直播还是日常对话，都能够一键帮您轻松录制
● 支持分别录制标签页和麦克风音频
● 提供暂停、预览和保存音频文件的功能
● 支持选择不同的音频格式保存文件，如MP3、WAV、Webm等
● 隐私优先，录音将被直接导出至您的电脑上，我们不存储您的数据或录音


如何使用：
1. 点击添加到 Chrome 按钮以安装 Record Audio 扩展。
2. 打开您希望捕捉音频的标签页。
3. 打开插件，选择录制类型：标签页音频、麦克风音频
4. 点击Start Tab Recording开始录制
5. 在录制过程中可以随时取消、暂停和保存音频文件
6. 预览音频，选择音频格式并保存文件到您的设备
 
问答Q&A： 
Q4：这款扩展免费吗？ 
A：目前我们的扩展是免费的，我们还上线了AI生成音乐的免费服务，您将享受更快的响应时间、无限制访问和优先客户支持。

Q：这个扩展程序支持哪些音频格式？ 
A：这款应用支持多种音频格式，包括MP3、WAV等，方便用户根据需求选择保存格式。

Q：能否同时录制标签页音频和麦克风音频？ 
A：是的，这款应用支持同时录制标签页和麦克风音频，让用户灵活选择录制内容。

Q：是否可以在录制过程中暂停和预览音频？ 
A：是的，用户可以随时暂停录制音频，预览录制内容，并在需要时保存文件。

Q：这款应用是否安全可靠？ 
A：是的，我们提供安全、高效的录制功能，确保用户能够方便地保存标签页和麦克风音频，保障数据安全和隐私。
long.zh_TW:
從標籤頁和麥克風錄製音頻，支援暫停、預覽和儲存到電腦
這款擴充功能可以幫助使用者輕鬆地錄製來自標籤頁和麥克風的音頻，支援錄製中暫停、錄製結果預覽、並將輸出檔案儲存到您的電腦上，目前支援Mp3、webm、wav格式。 快速、簡單、有效率－完美捕捉每一刻的聲音。

功能特點：
● 錄製時間不限，無論是線上會議、遠距課程、音樂會直播或日常對話，都能夠一鍵幫您輕鬆錄製
● 支援分別錄製標籤頁和麥克風音頻
● 提供暫停、預覽和儲存音訊檔案的功能
●支援選擇不同的音訊格式儲存文件，如MP3、WAV、Webm等
● 隱私優先，錄音將直接匯出至您的電腦上，我們不會儲存您的資料或錄音


如何使用：
1. 點選新增至 Chrome 按鈕以安裝 Record Audio 擴充功能。
2. 開啟您希望捕捉音訊的標籤頁。
3. 開啟插件，選擇錄製類型：標籤頁音訊、麥克風音訊
4. 點選Start Tab Recording開始錄製
5. 在錄製過程中可以隨時取消、暫停和儲存音訊文件
6. 預覽音頻，選擇音頻格式並儲存文件到您的設備
 
問答Q&A：
Q4：這款擴充免費嗎？
A：目前我們的擴充是免費的，我們還上線了AI生成音樂的免費服務，您將享受更快的回應時間、無限存取和優先客戶支援。

Q：這個擴充功能支援哪些音訊格式？
A：這款應用程式支援多種音訊格式，包括MP3、WAV等，方便用戶依需求選擇儲存格式。

Q：能否同時錄製標籤頁音訊和麥克風音訊？
A：是的，這款應用程式支援同時錄製標籤頁和麥克風音頻，讓用戶靈活選擇錄製內容。

Q：是否可以在錄製過程中暫停和預覽音訊？
A：是的，使用者可以隨時暫停錄製音頻，預覽錄製內容，並在需要時儲存檔案。

Q：這款應用是否安全可靠？
A：是的，我們提供安全、高效的錄製功能，確保用戶能夠方便地保存標籤頁和麥克風音頻，保障資料安全和隱私。
